name: aws-agents-video-transcript-buddy
description: AI-powered video transcript query system using AWS Bedrock AgentCore
author: Kishore Veleti

scripts.first-time: echo '\n‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê' echo '‚îÇ                                                                 ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ  PLATFORM-SPECIFIC (Windows)                                   ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ  ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ  ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ  npm run backend:dev:win    Start backend with hot reload      ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ  npm run backend:check:win  Verify Python dependencies         ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ  npm run test:backend:win   Run pytest tests                   ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ  npm run clean:venv:win     Remove venv                        ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îÇ                                                                 ‚îÇ' && echo '‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò\n'
scripts.commands: npm run first-time && npm run daily && npm run maintenance
scripts.clean:vector: rm -rf backend/microservices/video_transcript_buddy_service/data/vectors/* && echo '‚úÖ Vector store contents deleted'
scripts.clean:data: npm run clean:db && npm run clean:vector && npm run clean:transcripts && echo '‚úÖ All data cleaned'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:venv && npm run clean:data && echo '‚úÖ Everything cleaned (venv + data)'
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run setup && echo '‚úÖ Full reset complete'
scripts.aws:profile:setup:mac:
echo '
üîê Setting up AWS Profile: video-transcript-buddy
' && echo 'Enter your AWS credentials when prompted:
' && aws configure --profile video-transcript-buddy && echo '
‚úÖ AWS profile created!'
scripts.aws:profile:verify:mac:
echo '
üîç Verifying AWS Profile...
' && aws sts get-caller-identity --profile video-transcript-buddy && echo '
‚úÖ AWS profile is valid!'
scripts.aws:profile:list:mac: echo '\nüìã Available AWS Profiles:\n' && cat ~/.aws/credentials | grep '\[' || echo 'No profiles found'
scripts.aws:s3:create:mac: echo '\nü™£ Creating S3 bucket...\n' && aws s3 mb s3://video-transcript-buddy-bucket --profile video-transcript-buddy && echo '‚úÖ S3 bucket created!'
scripts.aws:profile:setup:win: echo üîê Setting up AWS Profile: video-transcript-buddy && echo Enter your AWS credentials when prompted: && aws configure --profile video-transcript-buddy && echo ‚úÖ AWS profile created!
scripts.aws:profile:verify:win: echo üîç Verifying AWS Profile... && aws sts get-caller-identity --profile video-transcript-buddy && echo ‚úÖ AWS profile is valid!
scripts.aws:profile:list:win: echo üìã Available AWS Profiles: && type %USERPROFILE%\.aws\credentials | findstr /r "\["
scripts.aws:s3:create:win: echo ü™£ Creating S3 bucket... && aws s3 mb s3://video-transcript-buddy-bucket --profile video-transcript-buddy && echo ‚úÖ S3 bucket created!
scripts.openai:setup:mac:
echo '
üîë Setting up OpenAI API Key
' && echo 'Add this line to your ~/.zshrc or ~/.bashrc:
' && echo '   export OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your-key-here
' && echo 'Then run: source ~/.zshrc (or ~/.bashrc)
'
scripts.openai:verify:mac: echo '\nüîç Verifying OpenAI API Key...\n' && if [ -n "$OPENAI_API_KEY" ]; then echo "‚úÖ OPENAI_API_KEY is set (${OPENAI_API_KEY:0:7}...)"; else echo '‚ùå OPENAI_API_KEY is NOT set!'; fi
scripts.openai:export:mac: read -p 'Enter your OpenAI API Key: ' key && echo "\nexport OPENAI_API_KEY=$key" >> ~/.zshrc && source ~/.zshrc && echo '\n‚úÖ OpenAI key added to ~/.zshrc'
scripts.openai:setup:win: echo üîë Setting up OpenAI API Key && echo. && echo Run this command in PowerShell (Admin): && echo    [System.Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable('OPENAI_API_KEY','sk-your-key-here','User') && echo. && echo Then restart your terminal.
scripts.openai:verify:win: echo üîç Verifying OpenAI API Key... && if defined OPENAI_API_KEY (echo ‚úÖ OPENAI_API_KEY is set) else (echo ‚ùå OPENAI_API_KEY is NOT set!)
scripts.venv:create:mac: mkdir -p ~/runtime_data/python_venvs && python3.11 -m venv ~/runtime_data/python_venvs/video_transcript_buddy_venv && echo '‚úÖ Virtual environment created!'
scripts.venv:install:mac: ~/runtime_data/python_venvs/video_transcript_buddy_venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ~/runtime_data/python_venvs/video_transcript_buddy_venv/bin/pip install -r backend/microservices/video_transcript_buddy_service/requirements.txt && echo '‚úÖ Dependencies installed!'
scripts.venv:setup:mac: npm run venv:create:mac && npm run venv:install:mac
scripts.venv:activate:mac:help:
echo '
üìå Run this command manually to activate venv:

   source ~/runtime_data/python_venvs/video_transcript_buddy_venv/bin/activate
'
scripts.venv:create:win: if not exist "%USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs" mkdir "%USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs" && python -m venv "%USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs\video_transcript_buddy_venv" && echo ‚úÖ Virtual environment created!
scripts.venv:install:win: "%USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs\video_transcript_buddy_venv\Scripts\pip" install --upgrade pip && "%USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs\video_transcript_buddy_venv\Scripts\pip" install -r backend/microservices/video_transcript_buddy_service/requirements.txt && echo ‚úÖ Dependencies installed!
scripts.venv:setup:win: npm run venv:create:win && npm run venv:install:win
scripts.venv:activate:win:help: echo üìå Run this command manually to activate venv: && echo. && echo    %USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs\video_transcript_buddy_venv\Scripts\activate && echo.
scripts.backend:check:mac: ~/runtime_data/python_venvs/video_transcript_buddy_venv/bin/python -c "import fastapi; import boto3; import faiss; import openai; print('‚úÖ All dependencies available!')"
scripts.backend:check:win: "%USERPROFILE%\runtime_data\python_venvs\video_transcript_buddy_venv\Scripts\python" -c "import fastapi; import boto3; import faiss; import openai; print('‚úÖ All dependencies available!')"
scripts.test:health:mac: curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | python3 -m json.tool && echo '\n‚úÖ Health check passed!'
scripts.test:api:mac: echo '\nüìã Testing API endpoints...\n' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/ | python3 -m json.tool
scripts.setup:credentials:mac: npm run aws:profile:setup:mac && npm run openai:verify:mac
scripts.setup:mac:
npm run venv:setup:mac && npm run env:setup:mac && echo '
üéâ Setup complete!

Next steps:
   1. Setup AWS: npm run aws:profile:setup:mac
   2. Setup OpenAI: npm run openai:setup:mac
   3. Verify: npm run verify:mac
   4. Start: npm run start:mac
'
scripts.verify:mac: echo '\nüîç Verifying setup...\n' && npm run aws:profile:verify:mac && npm run openai:verify:mac && npm run backend:check:mac
scripts.setup:credentials:win: npm run aws:profile:setup:win && npm run openai:verify:win
scripts.setup:win: npm run venv:setup:win && npm run env:setup:win && echo. && echo üéâ Setup complete! && echo. && echo Next steps: && echo    1. Setup AWS: npm run aws:profile:setup:win && echo    2. Setup OpenAI: npm run openai:setup:win && echo    3. Verify: npm run verify:win && echo    4. Start: npm run start:win
scripts.verify:win: echo üîç Verifying setup... && npm run aws:profile:verify:win && npm run openai:verify:win && npm run backend:check:win
scripts.help:
echo '
üìñ Video Transcript Buddy - Commands

  FIRST TIME SETUP:
    npm run setup:mac              - Setup venv & .env
    npm run aws:profile:setup:mac  - Configure AWS profile
    npm run openai:setup:mac       - Configure OpenAI key
    npm run verify:mac             - Verify all configs

  BACKEND:
    npm run start:mac              - Start backend server
    npm run test:health:mac        - Test health endpoint

  PORTALS (Frontend):
    npm run portal:hub:install     - Install Hub dependencies
    npm run portal:hub:dev         - Start Hub portal (port 4200)
    npm run portal:hub:build:prod  - Build for production

  FULL STACK:
    npm run dev:mac                - Start backend + frontend

  AWS:
    npm run aws:profile:verify:mac - Verify AWS profile
    npm run aws:s3:create:mac      - Create S3 bucket

  CLEANUP:
    npm run clean:venv:mac         - Remove venv
    npm run clean:vectors:mac      - Clear vector store
'
